https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/18qUe5ONoyIVtO3eShRRqVouvoP.jpg Now serving a life sentence for murder, James "Animal" Allen returns to fighting for cash in order to help his troubled son on the outside. However, with his newfound fame as a fighter, Animal uncovers a jailhouse conspiracy that threatens to cause racial tensions to explode. Animal 2
